General.Name: Desarrolladora Homex S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Desarrolladora Homex, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as an integrated housing company in Mexico. It also develops, constructs, and sells affordable housing, middle-income, and residential housing. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Culiacán, Mexico.
General.Address: Boulevard Rotarismo No. 1140, Culiacán, SI, Mexico, 80020

4.Name: Mr. Carlos Hernandez Arroyo
4.Title: Director of Human Devel. & Social Responsibility
